pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a historic building. The camera slowly pans upward and to the right, gliding across the ornate and detailed facade of the Florence Cathedral. This movement allows the viewer to appreciate the intricate sculptures, carvings, and polychrome marble work against a clear blue sky.
